title: Topic 001 Question 044
body: You need to be alerted when users share sensitive documents from Microsoft OneDrive to any users outside your company.
options: From the Microsoft Purview compliance portal, start a data investigation.
From the Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps portal, create a file policy.
From the Azure Active Directory admin center, configure an Identity Protection policy.
From the Exchange admin center, create a data loss prevention (DLP) policy.
